alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Essex, southwestern Addison and northwestern Rutland Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rogers Rock Campground, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Sudbury, Hubbardton, Shoreham, Salisbury, Orwell, Benson, Brandon, Leicester, Whiting, Goshen, Pittsford, Chittenden, Cornwall, West Haven, Ripton, Benson Bay, East Middlebury, Coates Point and Black Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
